join_thousands: Join thousands of students who have achieved fluency and opened new opportunities.
have_questions: Have questions about our courses? We're here to help you start your English learning journey.
help_text: Tell us how we can help you...
choose_path_description: Whether you're starting from scratch or looking to perfect your English, we have the right course for you.
slogan: Empowering students worldwide to master English through innovative online courses and personalized learning experiences.
hero1: I, Shahribonu Shavkatovna, founder of Act in Maximum and creator of LingUp, have set myself a goal ‚Äî to help young people master the English language and achieve their dreams.
hero2: LingUp is not just a course; it is new opportunities for you. With 15 years of experience, an IELTS 8.5, and over 5,000 students, I share the secrets of success.
hero3: Here, every lesson is built on strategies, practice, and proven systems that lead to great results. Thousands of students have achieved their dreams. Now it‚Äôs your turn!
celebrating_our_studets_remarkable_journ: Celebrating our students' remarkable journey to language mastery and academic excellence
dont_miss_out_spots: Don't miss out on the remaining spots üöÄ
